title: Bloomberg Markets: Robitaille Says Kids Should Play All Sports
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Robitaille Says Kids Should Play All Sports
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Luc Robitaille\u0010Pres:Business Operations\u0010Los Angeles Kings\u0010Discussing why kids should play a variety of sports rather than specializing in one sport at a young age.
